arts.ttl: Chelsea 'line up move for Sunderland starlet Jobe Bellingham' - but face stiff competition from European heavyweights
arts.sum: Chelsea are reportedly among a trio of European heavyweights eyeing up a move for Sunderland star Jobe Bellingham as clubs keep tabs on the English prodigies future.

arts.ttl: Leicester 'deserved points' from Chelsea game - Van Nistelrooy
arts.sum: Leicester City manager Ruud van Nistelrooy says his side "deserved points" following their performance against Chelsea which resulted in a 1-0 defeat at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Chelsea transfer news: Blues 'make contact' for £42m defender as 'enticing offer' revealed
arts.sum: Chelsea apparently initiate contact over a swoop for Feyenoord centre-back David Hancko, who is also on the radar of Tottenham Hotspur.

arts.ttl: Chelsea's next Premier League fixtures compared to top-four rivals after Leicester win
arts.sum: Here, football.london takes a look at Chelsea's upcoming Premier League fixtures compared to their top-four rivals. Chelsea's next five Premier League fixtures

arts.ttl: Thomas Tuchel shows true Chelsea colours during Leicester City clash as England boss spotted
arts.sum: Tuchel, who will have had his eye on Palmer and Levi Colwill during the Blues' win over Leicester City, has drawn up a 55-man 'long list' of players ahead of the upcoming international break. Mark Bullingham said: "I think Thomas realised early on that you don't build those connections in the six days you get together, so he's put a lot of effort into that.

arts.ttl: Chelsea players' reaction to Cole Palmer after Leicester City penalty miss
arts.sum: Jadon Sancho has jumped to the defence of Cole Palmer after the Chelsea attacker missed a penalty with his goal drought now extended to nine games in all competitions. Chelsea did not require Palmer to score as the Blues edged the match 1-0 with Marc Cucurella's goal on 60 minutes proving to be enough at Stamford Bridge.

arts.ttl: Liverpool shock Arsenal to set up FA Cup semi-final against Chelsea
arts.sum: The other semi-final will see City meet United in a Manchester derby

arts.ttl: Chelsea lining up Bellingham offer - Monday's gossip
arts.sum: Chelsea lining up Jobe Bellingham offer, Real Madrid and Bayern Munich to rival Manchester City for Florian Wirtz, and Chelsea and Barcelona have concrete Rafael Leao interest.

arts.ttl: Palmer's record penalty streak ends against Leicester
arts.sum: Cole Palmer's Premier League record streak of scoring the most penalties without missing came to an end on Sunday afternoon after his spot-kick was saved superbly by Leicester City goalkeeper Mads Hermansen . Palmer's failure to score his 13th penalty means he falls down the list for the best conversion rates among those who have taken a minimum of 10 spot-kicks.

arts.ttl: Chelsea beat Fulham to win Summer Series
arts.sum: Nkunku says lifting silverware in pre-season is a great boost ahead of the start of the Premier League. The Video Cloud account was not found.
